sentence: He will ultimately face one of his Republican challengers, including retired football player Herschel Walker and former Trump administration official Latham Saddler.

title: Democrats bid to keep the Senate will involve plans to fight inflation and promises for a renewed agenda

sentence: In the poll, 872 registered Georgia voters were asked: If the election were held today and the candidates for U.S. Senate were Democrat Raphael Warnock and Republican Herschel Walker, who would you vote for?

title: Poll: Herschel Walker Holds 3-Point lead over Warnock in Georgia Senate Race

sentence: Warnock is anticipated to run against former football star Herschel Walker in a race that will see millions of dollars spent on the campaign trail to gain even the slightest edge.

title: Warnock grapples with strong headwinds in Georgia

sentence: Despite a flurry of bad press and complaints from his primary competitors that hes avoiding the campaign trail, Herschel Walker is the leading Republican contender in the race to face the Democratic incumbent, Raphael Warnock, in this falls key Georgia Senate race.

title: Republican rivals try to topple Georgia football star Herschel Walker in key Senate race

sentence: Republican Herschel Walker is the frontrunner among six GOP candidates in the May 24 primary.
